priorVersion.title: CDISC SDTM Tumor Response Assessment Test Name Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C96781

self.title: CDISC SDTM Tumor Response Assessment Test Name Terminology

definition: Terminology relevant to the test names that describe an assessment of tumor response to treatment or therapy.
name: Tumor Response Assessment Test Name
preferredTerm: CDISC SDTM Tumor Response Assessment Test Name Terminology

terms.definition: An assessment of the most clinically favorable overall response of the disease to the therapy.
An assessment of the equivocality of disease progression based on a newly identified lesion.
A non-radiological determination of disease progression based on symptoms or other findings.
An assessment of the response of a non-target tumor(s) to the therapy.
An assessment of the overall response of the disease to the therapy. (NCI)
An assessment of the response of a target tumor(s) to the therapy.
